channel.title: Chances of being caught + other
channel.description:
Okay.. im thinking of botting the smelting 2k steel bars to cannonballs..
Can someone suggest a good bot to use and the chances of being banned doing so?>

item.title: Chances of being caught + other
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Lmaoss paul that reminded me of the endless hitler gets banned on xbox live vids

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of being caught + other
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

[quote=“TheBeanie, post:10, topic:328397”]Update:

So i started using RSbot…

Gone from 46 to 52 agility and 43 to 49 herblore

Doing thieving now…[/quote]

TheBeanie… was seduced by the Dark Side of the Force. He ceased to be TheBeanie and became a botter. When that happened, the good man who was TheBeanie was destroyed.

Luke: There is still good in him.
Obi-Wan: He’s more machine now than man; twisted and evil.
Yoda: Botting are you? What know you of Bots? For eight hundred years have I trained Runescape Characters. My own counsel will I keep on who is to be Botted. A Botter must have the deepest commitment, the most serious mind. This one a long time have I watched. All his life has he looked away… to the future, to the horizon. Never his mind on where he was. Hmm? What he was doing. Hmph. Adventure. Heh. Excitement. Heh. A Botter craves not these things. You are reckless.

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of being caught + other
item.dc:creator: @Eh_Pretty_Easy Eh Pretty Easy
item.description:
@Eh_Pretty_Easy wrote:

Why would the chances to get banned be high while making cannon balls? It’s like, never happens. I botted 1-92 wc on lvl 3 skiller with like 20m profit, no bans, nothing. Just use rsbot, it does the job (even though a million other players use it…)

Read full topic

item.title: Chances of being caught + other
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:6, topic:328397”][quote author=the bank link=topic=424788.msg3119786#msg3119786 date=1265428487]
The chance of ban isnt worth the 800k you might make in profit.
[/quote]
I’ve made a couple mill without being banned.[/quote]
But in this case he would have only made 800k.

Read full topic

i sold em
